description: All services must use HTTPS with valid TLS certs
fix_suggestion: Install valid SSL cert, force HTTPS redirection

description: Data in transit must be encrypted
fix_suggestion: Use HTTPS and disable insecure protocols

description: Enable HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
fix_suggestion: Add HSTS header with a sufficient max-age and includeSubDomains

description: Enforce TLS 1.2+ and disable weak ciphers
fix_suggestion: Disable TLS 1.0/1.1 and legacy ciphers; prefer TLS 1.2/1.3

description: Website must have a clear, accessible privacy policy
fix_suggestion: Add a privacy policy page and link it prominently

description: Privacy policy must be clearly discoverable from the homepage
fix_suggestion: Add a prominent 'Privacy Policy' link in header/footer

description: Privacy policy must identify the data controller and contact details
fix_suggestion: Include company/legal entity name, address, and contact email

description: Disclose recipients or categories of recipients of personal data
fix_suggestion: List vendors/partners or categories with whom data is shared

description: All images must have alt text for accessibility
fix_suggestion: Add `alt` attribute to all tags

description: Ensure sufficient contrast ratio between text and background
fix_suggestion: Adjust colors to meet minimum 4.5:1 contrast

description: Components must expose correct ARIA roles, names, and values
fix_suggestion: Ensure interactive controls have proper role and accessible name

description: All functionality operable by keyboard; focus is visible
fix_suggestion: Ensure focusable elements and visible focus styles; remove keyboard traps

description: Set a Content-Security-Policy header to mitigate XSS
fix_suggestion: Add a strict CSP (default-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; ...)

description: Set X-Frame-Options (or frame-ancestors) to prevent clickjacking
fix_suggestion: Use X-Frame-Options: DENY or SAMEORIGIN (prefer CSP frame-ancestors)

description: Set X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
fix_suggestion: Return X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff on all responses

description: Set an appropriate Referrer-Policy to limit sensitive referrer data
fix_suggestion: Use Referrer-Policy: no-referrer or strict-origin-when-cross-origin

description: Cookies must use Secure and HttpOnly (and SameSite where applicable)
fix_suggestion: Set Secure, HttpOnly, SameSite=Lax/Strict for session cookies; avoid sensitive cookies in JS

description: Run periodic vulnerability scans and address issues
fix_suggestion: Use scanners like Nikto and ZAP to identify issues

description: Avoid exposing server software version in responses
fix_suggestion: Disable Server header/version leakage

description: Disable directory listing on web servers
fix_suggestion: Turn off autoindex / directory browsing in server config (e.g., Apache, Nginx)

description: Ensure no default credentials or sample applications are accessible
fix_suggestion: Remove default admin accounts, sample apps, and change all factory-set passwords

description: Identify and update outdated server software or libraries
fix_suggestion: Patch or upgrade server software and third-party libraries flagged as outdated
